snippet.title: Ruffy and the Riverside - Official Gameplay Overview Trailer | The MIX Fall Showcase 2024
snippet.description: Get a deep dive into the gameplay of Ruffy and the Riverside in this new trailer for the upcoming action-adventure game. The trailer showcases Ruffy's magical world, Ruffy's swap abilities, quirky characters you'll meet, gameplay, and more. Ruffy and the Riverside will be available on PC, PS5 (PlayStation 5), Xbox One, Xbox Series X, and Nintendo Switch in Q1 2025.
